alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 1:16PM EST until March 13 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Lake effect snow showers, increasing into tonight. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches in the most persistent snow showers. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Cayuga county. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and areas of poor visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL...Temperatures will fall through the 20s with wind chill values falling into the single digits.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow showers will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
